channel.title: 525 Questions (2 .. Please awnser)
channel.description:
Ok please help..
How do i change the client where it says `connecting to jc-scape` to Connecting to LabeebPK`?
and on the server how do i change `welcome to jc-scape`to `welcome to labeebpk`?

item.title: 525 Questions (2 .. Please awnser)
item.dc:creator: @Coder_Fatality Coder Fatality
item.description:
@Coder_Fatality wrote:

Client

Usally I do 317, but in a client their’s usally a client.java file open that,
Next you type Ctrl-H then put what it says that you want to change, and in second box
you put what you want it to change to.

Server

Ok try to find a file you add objects in, ive never coded a 525 but a friend helps me, You do the same thing
as in the client help one, Ctrl-h and then put what it says that you want to change, and in second
box you put what you want to change it to.

Hope this helped!
And Good luck to your Server/Client/Project!

Read full topic
